channel.title: Reflections on AEB - PD Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Reflections on AEB - PD Portfolio

item.title: Reflection on collaboration
item.description: Objective: This year I will attend all classes prepared and show enthusiasm for projects. By the end of the year I will not have any missing parts of the assignments and not have any retakes. I will achieve this by setting deadlines for assignments and dedicating a minimum of an hour everyday to do them. Acting out: This year I will attend all classes prepared and show enthusiasm for projects. By the end of the term I will not have any missing parts of the assignments and not have any retakes.
